name: RubifiedSwift
summary: Swift extensions for Number, String, Array, Dictionary... inspired by Ruby-styled implementations
description:
Bunch of Swift extensions for Number, String, Array, Dictionary... written in Ruby-styled implementations.
Inspired by ObjectiveSugar (https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/ObjectiveSugar) & RubySugar (https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/RubySugar)
